Get In touch
At Boca, our standard is to serve great food alongside a memorable experience. Your feedback helps us meet this standard. Please use the form to help us best serve you.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Accordion Content
Do you accept reservations?
Reservations are not required for dining at Boca. However, we do recommend making a reservation in order to ease your dining experience. Please click
here
to make a reservation. For parties of 6 or more, please
call
the restaurant directly.
Can I host an event at Boca?
We would love to host your next event at Boca.  Please use this link to
book an event
.
Do you offer Happy Hour?
Yes! We offer Happy Hour Monday-Friday from 3:00pm – 6:00pm. You can view our Happy Hour offerings
here
.
Do you offer Brunch?
Yes, we offer Brunch on Saturdays and Sundays from 9:30am to 3:00pm. Guests can enjoy a variety of Brunch favorites and bottomless mimosas. You can view our Brunch menu
here
.
Do you offer gluten free, vegetarian or vegan options?
While we do not have specific gluten free, vegetarian or vegan options, we will do our best to accommodate guests with dietary restrictions upon request. Please be sure to let your server know of any special requests upon arrival.
Where are you located?
We have (3) locations  in Winter Park, Florida, Sarasota, Florida and Lake Mary, Florida. You can view their address and hours
here
.
How can I contact the restaurant?
Contact Us

Book An Event

Book An Event
RESERVATIONS
Events at boca
At Boca, we believe that every special occasion begins with exceptional food and heartfelt hospitality. From intimate gatherings to full size celebrations, our team will curate the perfect experience just for you. We offer multiple spaces to host private and semi-private events.
The Magnolia Room at Boca Winter Park
Overlooking Park Avenue, The Magnolia Room seats up to 32 guests privately and offers
audio video amenities.
The Cypress Room at Boca Winter Park
With an upbeat, yet relaxed and cozy vibe, The Cypress Room seats 52 guests in a semi-private atmosphere. The space can also accommodate larger groups for cocktail receptions.
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
Host Unforgettable Private & Semi-Private Events at Boca
Whether you’re planning an intimate dinner party, a vibrant cocktail reception, a business luncheon, or a celebratory brunch, Boca offers warm, inviting spaces perfect for any occasion. With multiple locations across Florida—including Winter Park, Sarasota and Lake Mary—Boca provides cozy, neighborhood charm with elevated seasonal cuisine, handcrafted cocktails, and heartfelt hospitality.
At Boca, every event is personal. Our private and semi-private dining areas are designed to bring people together in stylish comfort—ideal for birthdays, corporate events, wedding celebrations, holiday parties, baby showers, rehearsal dinners, networking mixers, and more.
Why Choose Boca for Your Next Event?
Flexible event spaces in
Winter Park, Sarasota, and Lake Mary
Fresh, seasonal menus curated for your group
Boutique wine selections and signature Market Fresh cocktails
Stylish industrial farmhouse décor with indoor & outdoor seating
Heartfelt hospitality and personalized service
Full and partial buyouts available for larger gatherings
We believe every celebration deserves attention to detail, genuine connection, and that extra bit of magic. Let our team craft a memorable experience for your guests—from thoughtfully prepared menus to the cozy ambiance that feels just like home.
Boca is perfect for:
Corporate Events & Business Meetings
Engagement Parties & Rehearsal Dinners
Birthday Celebrations & Anniversaries
Holiday Gatherings & Seasonal Soirées
Bridal & Baby Showers
Networking Events & Community Mixers
Graduation Dinners & Family Reunions
Book your next event with us in
Winter Park, Sarasota and Lake Mary.
Let us help you celebrate & make your event special at Boca.
